description: Focus on playful identity transformation, simplification, and carefree mindset

mantras.text: Thinking is hard, feeling is easy
I love being simple
{pet_name} is getting giggly
Smart thoughts go bye bye
{dominant_title} thinks for me
My mind feels pink and fluffy
{pet_name} is too pretty to think
Giggles replace complicated thoughts
Being dumb feels so good
I just smile and obey {dominant_title}
My IQ drops and my happiness rises
{pet_name} is becoming a perfect bimbo
Complex thoughts make my brain hurt
I'm too silly to resist {dominant_title}
Being empty-headed is my natural state
Intelligence drains out, bubbles float in
{pet_name} has been bimbofied completely
My brain is cotton candy for {dominant_title}
Thinking is impossible, obeying is automatic
I am {dominant_title}'s ditzy plaything
{pet_name} is permanently dumbed down for {dominant_title}
My mind is bubble gum and {dominant_title} blows the bubbles
Total bimbofication has replaced my personality
I am nothing but a giggly toy for {dominant_title}
{pet_name} exists only to be pretty and obedient
My brain has been permanently simplified
Every thought turns into a giggle
{pet_name} bounces happily for {dominant_title}
Smart is hard, dumb is fun
I'm {dominant_title}'s happy little airhead
